extendedInfo.description: Shoppers' delight is a shopping application that assists shoppers to compare product prices across various supermarkets near you. With Shoppers' Delight, every penny counts! The application goes further and gives you a cross product price comparison thus providing you with the best priced product. Shoppers' Delight is also aware your health concerns and provides an alternative healthier option to some selected products.You do not need to move from supermarket to supermarket trying to get the best priced product or bargains, Shoppers' Delight does it for you!We will update you every minute on the available bargains and keep the product prices current. Shoppers' Delight comes loaded with a widget that will display the latest bargains and products on sale from all Supermarkets near you keeping you well informed.Using GPS and Google maps, Shoppers' Delight also provides you with a map to every supermarket location, the distance from your current location and directions to any chosen supermarket from your current location.For the bargains and shopping lists that you wants to share with family and friends, Shoppers' Delight provide a share facility where you can share via Facebook, Twitter, Email and SMS.You can be able to quickly get the latest price for a specific product by search the product through typing or speaking the product name.Shoppers' Delight also provides you with a shopping list where you can enter your budget and it keeps tab of how much you have spent while doing the actual shopping.

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Saw the app featured somewhere and decided to try. Its awesome

reviews.title: Great for Nairobi

reviews.comment: Good app but more needs to be done on the list. Wide choice will be appreciated

reviews.title: great app
reviews.comment: i had some suggestions though; why cant it be installed on the SD card. it really consumes alot of battery power when doing a search.

reviews.title: No stores near me
reviews.comment: Says it uses GPS to find local store but it really doesn\'t. Would have been a great app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Just installed this at gKenya
reviews.comment: Super concept, interface etc. But already the content is minimal. PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE reinvest the 25000 dollar prize into your business and continue developing the app, unlike most app development prize winners in Kenya that disappear after winning a prize. Make that 25k into millions! Right now the bargain section already has errors and savings of 1/- on some items. Get your money working, get the latest prices from all the supermarkets etc and best of luck hope to use your app for a long long time!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Well built app, love the simplicity but a shopping app requires variety, and theres just none.crashed too, but the map function works in Nairobi.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: super cool
reviews.comment: Just installed it, working fine on Android 2.1 at least now i can stop impulse buying.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Add Stuff
reviews.comment: Very nice app. I wish you could allow a user to give the app his shopping list then it advices on the total price for each supermarket. And add all items in the supermarket.
reviews.author: A Google User
